channel.title: Need Tut
channel.description:
I need a tut that makes it say [Admin]/[pmod]/[mod] after the ::yell command so it will look like this ::yell message here it will come up like this [Admin]namehere Messagehere
Thanks in advance[br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2007, 06:21:04 PM[/size][hr]i know ones out there

item.title: Need Tut
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

yah. thats good idea, and u can add that for each player right like in my idea so u can see who says what,

Read full topic

item.title: Need Tut
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Sorry, this is the better version of it.

else if (command.startsWith("adminupdate") && command.length() > 5) if (playerRights >= 2) { command.substring(5).replaceAll("", ""); command.substring(5).replaceAll("", ""); command.substring(5).trim(); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:" +command.substring(5); }

So if you type “::adminupdate Server will shut down due to an update.” it will say “Server will shut down due to an update.”.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Tut
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

that seems the same

how bout this.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“adminyell”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
messageToAll(“admin says:YOUR MESSAGE HERE”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“modyell”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
messageToAll(“modsays:YOUR MESSAGE HERE”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“playeryell”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
messageToAll(“playersays: (message)”);
}

but, these comands need the thing where u can say ::adminyell i like pie
and then i like pie is said to all. mine just says one message and u eed to reocmpile evreytime to change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Tut
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminupdate") && playerRights >= 2) { messageToAll("YOUR MESSAGE HERE"); }

Change “YOUR MESSAGE HERE” to your desired message. You MUST have brackets around it like the ones around YOUR MESSAGE HERE.

Read full topic
